headline: Duke Energy (DUK) Laps the Stock Market: Here's Why
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Duke Energy (DUK) stood at $123.54, denoting a +1.62% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: Duke Energy Helps Communities Across Ohio and Kentucky Prepare Sites To Bring Local Investment, Jobs
summary: CHICAGO, IL / ACCESS Newswire / October 3, 2025 /Duke Energy's Site Readiness Program has enabled evaluation of 42 sites and triggered 5,400 new jobs and $2 billion in capital investment in Ohio and Kentucky since the program began in 2010 Three high-potential ...
